'HMS Kingham' was a  of the Royal Navy.
Their names were all chosen from villages ending in -ham. The minesweeper was named after Kingham in Oxfordshire.
Notes
References
*Blackman, R.V.B. ed. ''Jane's Fighting Ships'' (1953)
